channel.title: Project: GateScape Pk
channel.description:
[center][b][u]GateScape PK[/b][/center]
[center][img]http://i93.photobucket.com/albums/l60/Mad_Mercenary/GateScape.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]Hi, I had one of these threads in the past, but no one ever responded. O M G's topic reminded me that I still need a crew, so credits to him.[/center]
[center][u][b]The Plan[/b][/u][/center]
[center]My plan is to hire a sort of "crew"/developing team. I have a lot of the coding done, mostly by Blitz, my former coder/co-owner. I fixed many errors and so did my other friend, Justin. The source is great, imo. It's a very well done edited P16 server, and I just can't fix everything by myself. . I plan to make this server as error free as possible, and to do that I need some help. When I get more experienced, I'm going to TRY (note the TRY) and make it so that it has a custom area, like outside of RuneScape areas, if that makes sense.[/center]
[center][u][b]The Team[/b][/u][/center]
[center][i]Post here if you want to be a part of the team. Must have knowledge of coding (obviously).[/i][/center]
[center][u][i]The "Crew" List[/i][/u][/center] [center][b]Everyone that has joined.[/b][center]
[center][b]Du Thelduin (me)[/b][/center]
[center][u][b]Groups[/b][/u][/center]
[center][u][i]Coding[/i][/u][/center] [center][b]The coding of the server.[/b][center]
[center][b]Du Thelduin (me)[/b][/center]
[center][u][i]Forum Team (Forum Mods, Admins)[/i][/u][/center] [center][b]Forums are already made, but I need some staff.[/b][center]
[center][b]Du Thelduin (me) - Admin[/b][/center]
[center][u][i]Graphics/Other[/i][/u][/center] [center][b]Title says it all.[/b][center]
[center][b]Du Thelduin (me)[/b][/center]
[center][u][b]So Far...[/b][/u][/center]
So far the server is good, but could use a lot of work.
Here are some of the things it already has:
Construction Working Staking Anti- ::noclip Working Melee and Mage A lot more, a sort of basic server, could use a lot of work as I stated.
Things I need to address:
Pking, there's only wildy right now, it works like real RS. Ranging, is way too powerful and it's messed. Exp rate, too slow. There's a way to dupe, but I already fixed it. Glitches. ...and a LOT more.
[center][u][b]Things added today (4/2/07):[/b][/u]
[center]Right Click Ban Anti ::noclip[/center]
[i]Thanks for reading! I'll be adding more. :P[/i]

item.title: Project: GateScape Pk
item.dc:creator: @Du_Thelduin Du Thelduin
item.description:
@Du_Thelduin wrote:

Thanks.

I’m determined and prepared. I really want to go through with this.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 02, 2007, 04:55:08 PM[/size][hr]Added Today:

Anti-null code
Added RuneCrafting[br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2007, 03:09:52 PM[/size][hr]Added Today:
Herblore

item.title: Project: GateScape Pk
item.dc:creator: @Du_Thelduin Du Thelduin
item.description:
@Du_Thelduin wrote:

[center][u]GateScape PK[/center]

[center][/center]

[center]Hi, I had one of these threads in the past, but no one ever responded. O M G’s topic
reminded me that I still need a crew, so credits to him.[/center]

[center]The Plan[/center]

[center]My plan is to hire a sort of “crew”/developing team. I have a lot of the coding done, mostly
by Blitz, my former coder/co-owner. I fixed many errors and so did my other friend, Justin.
The source is great, imo. It’s a very well done edited P16 server, and I just can’t fix everything by myself.
.
I plan to make this server as error free as possible, and to do that I need some help. When I
get more experienced, I’m going to TRY (note the TRY) and make it so that it has a custom area, like outside of RuneScape areas, if that makes sense.[/center]

[center]The Team[/center]

[center]Post here if you want to be a part of the team. Must have knowledge of coding
(obviously).[/center]

[center]The “Crew” List[/center]
[center]Everyone that has joined.[center]

[center]Du Thelduin (me)[/center]

[center]Groups[/center]

[center]Coding[/center]
[center]The coding of the server.[center]

[center]Du Thelduin (me)[/center]

[center]Forum Team (Forum Mods, Admins)[/center]
[center]Forums are already made, but I need some staff.[center]

[center]Du Thelduin (me) - Admin[/center]

[center]Graphics/Other[/center]
[center]Title says it all.[center]

[center]Du Thelduin (me)[/center]

[center]So Far…[/center]

So far the server is good, but could use a lot of work.

Here are some of the things it already has:

Construction
Working Staking
Anti- ::noclip
Working Melee and Mage
A lot more, a sort of basic server, could use a lot of work as I stated.

Things I need to address:

Pking, there’s only wildy right now, it works like real RS.
Ranging, is way too powerful and it’s messed.
Exp rate, too slow.
There’s a way to dupe, but I already fixed it.
Glitches.
…and a LOT more.

[center]Things added today (4/2/07):

[center]Right Click Ban
Anti ::noclip[/center]

Thanks for reading! I’ll be adding more.

Read full topic
